title: Let’s Watch Aqours’ Live!
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Heeey, Rinacchi, over here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Thank you for waiting, Nozomi-san. Rina-chan’s board「Bow」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu. I’m really looking forward to seeing Aqours’ live.... Hmm? Rinacchi, aren’t your face a little bit red?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Is that so? Maybe it’s because I’m too excited.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Well, if you’re like this, then you’ll surely get tired in the middle of cheering for them. You should drink some water. Here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Thank you. *Gulp Gulp*.... Phew, that feels better.... It seemed like I was thirsty from the heat.... I didn’t notice.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>You can’t enjoy the live to the fullest if you’re not in the perfect condition, after all~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I can feel the power already. Let’s get ready right away. Towel, lightstick.... Ah, that’s right. There’s something I want to ask you again, Nozomi-san. I’ve been practicing the washi washi trial version on Hanpen. That’s why, after the live is over.... I want you to teach me the real washi washi.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>....Uhh, did you only practice the trial version with Hanpen? Have you done it to other people?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Mostly with Hanpen.... Also, a little bit with Ayumu-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hmm, then let’s practice it on a person next. Try it on me first, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
